programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Broccoli - It's Broccoli and his floret, Broc, performing their phenomenal ventriloquist act.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Lychee - Love and peace symbol, Lychee, performs his song - "All You Need is Lychee!"

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Operation Kiwi - Supertato, Carrot and Tomato are exploring in the plant aisle when they hear a strange noise. They follow the noise and meet the famous Kiwi the Explorer, who needs their help.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep74
programme.desc: Blow - It's a windy day and the Teletubbies collect lots of leaves that have blown off the trees. The leaves go everywhere in Home Dome, so The Noo-noo cleans up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Juice - Dee encourages a friend to say `juice', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. There's orange juice, apple juice, tomato juice and sip-it-in-the-heat juice.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Fairy Tale Trail - Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt. But when Zip becomes unsure about the clues, will the friends still get their magical fairy tale prize?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Messy Migration - When a little turtle gets stranded on the beach in OKIDO, Messy helps her rejoin her friends so they can begin their journey across the ocean.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Slide - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep45
programme.desc: TV Shop - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Bob Bilby - When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Trains - All aboard the Dad Train! Bingo goes from home to daycare to her job at the vet every morning, but there's trouble on the line as a mischievous Bluey throws everyone off schedule.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andy and the Puma Cubs - Andy, Jen & Scout head to Patagonia, in South America on a baby animal mission in search of mother puma and her four cubs.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Mission: Open Day - When Dan's favourite toy goes missing at the Search and Rescue Centre Open Day, Dan needs his super-nose to race to the rescue... of Squiddy!

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Macaw and Agouti - This episode features the macaw and the agouti. Their wild connection is they are both nut crackers.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Cool Pirates - Captain Captain has been checking out all the latest looks in her Perfectly Pirate magazine. Sandy and Seaweed aren't dressing up to Captain Captain's high standards so Seaweed suggests a competition!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep27
programme.desc: The Spooky Badge - The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound. What is going on?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep26
programme.desc: The Obstacle Course Badge - It's time for the annual Animal Obstacle Course Race. The animals need to work together in teams to complete the course.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: Why are used cars in Venezuela a thriving industry? - In Venezuela demand for second-hand vehicles is huge, and they are even used as investments -- a hedge against inflation so voracious it makes no sense to park money in a bank account. "Only in Venezuela can the price of used cars go up," said a man as he leaned against a 1995 Ford Lariat he wants to sell at a tidy profit of 8,000 bolivars, or 1,860 dollars, after owning it for three months.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: Venezuelas Car Crisis: Why do used cars cost as much as new ones? - In Venezuela, years of halted imports, sky-high tariffs, and economic collapse have left drivers stuck between aging Toyotas and pricey Chinese SUVs in a distorted market. Plus: REV puts the new Mazda 6e to the test.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC314VolkanovskivsLopes

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC306SugaSeanOMalleyvsMerabDvalishvili
programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines one of the most historic and spectacular UFC events of all-time, as Riyadh Season Noche UFC takes over Sphere in Las Vegas to celebrate Mexican Independence Day. Inimitable Suga Sean O'Malley defends his Bantamweight title against the relentless Merab Dvalishvili, plus TUF Season 32 coaches Alexa Grasso and Valentina Schevchenko battle for the women's Flyweight belt, and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep18
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.
